statements.statement:
select A.* from sys_property A where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> and ( A.id like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.parent_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' ) </#if> <#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if> <#if query.code??> and A.code = '${query.code}' </#if>
<#if query.parentCode??> and A.parent_code = '${query.parentCode}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name = '${query.name}' </#if> <#if query.value??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}%' </#if> <#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}%' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by sn </#if> </#if>
